actions.name: Diamond Dust
actions.description: Effect: While Foggy or Snowy Weather is active, the user's Fairy- and Ice-Type attacks have 30% increased Power. The user is treated as having the Psychic Type for the effects of Foggy Weather.

system.description: Effect: While Foggy or Snowy Weather is active, the user's Fairy- and Ice-Type attacks have 30% increased Power. The user is immune to the negative effects of Foggy and Snowy Weather. The user is treated as having the Psychic Type for the effects of Foggy Weather.
